name: Bankrupt Restaurant
description:
In this game, player is working as a waiter to serve the customer by their order. The game target is to kill the boss by the mad customer. You can do the wrong serve for example, take the wrong  meal to the customer, do not care the waiting customer or do not take the meal to the customer. 

hint: Try to persuade customer to hit you boss not you. 

This is an exercise U3D game which is not finished with bugs, werid model and lack tutoral.

Thank you for trying!

Contact: yuriwang99@gmail.com
